headline: Why NextEra Energy Bounced Back Today
summary: A tax that had been added to the Senate tax and spending bill for wind and solar developers over the weekend has been stripped out.  The tax would have harmed project developers such as NextEra and others.  Shares of utility and renewables power developer NextEra Energy (NYSE: NEE) rallied today, up 5.3% in Tuesday's trading session.

headline: Sunrun, SolarEdge, and Other Solar Stocks Jump as Republicans Strip Excise Tax From Spending Bill
summary: Sunrun  surged 13%,  SolarEdge Technologies  rose 9.7%, and  Enphase Energy  was up 7.3%.  Shares of  First Solar  the largest solar manufacturer in the U.S., were up 1.5%, while  NextEra Energy  a leading provider of wind and solar power, gained 2.9%.

headline: The Big Beautiful Bill's Math — And Market Reaction — Doesn't Quite Add Up
summary: GOP senators struggled to push President Donald Trump's One Big Beautiful Bill Act to a vote in the Senate today, with sights set on it clearing the House as soon as Wednesday.  President Trump has demanded that Congress deliver the federal budget and tax bill to his desk for a signature by July Fourth.  The Senate also took a tougher line on renewable energy tax credits, which prompted Tesla CEO Elon Musk to weigh in against the bill.
